nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene

Class BLSpansWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.search.spans.Spans
      • nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene.SpansAbstract
        • nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene.BLSpans
          • nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene.BLSpansWrapper

  • public class BLSpansWrapper
extends BLSpans
    Wrap a "simple" Spans object in a BLSpans object. It will give the guarantuess appropriate for single-term Spans like that of SpanTermQuery, SpanRegexQuery, etc.
